name: Planet BugsOut!
description:
In the last few centuries, Humanity has reached new heights and explored every corner of the galaxy. Steve, a Fledgling planet architect who is also bored out of his mind has recently joined the fieldwork. Can you help him create a planet without any bugs ? 

Creators of the game: 

Ayushmaan Singh 

Soumya Bairagya 

Maitreya Patankar
